movies.title: The People Who Own the Dark
movies.plot: A group of rich businessmen and military officers who are partying in an old castle are spared when a nuclear war ravages the earth. When they venture out into the nearest town to search for food and supplies, they find most of the residents blinded, and soon they discover the existence of a sinister group called The People Who Own The Dark.
movies.simplePlot: A group of rich businessmen and military officers who are partying in an old castle are spared when a nuclear war ravages the earth. When they venture out into the nearest town to search ...

biography.bio: Nadiuska was born on January 19, 1952 in Schierling, Bavaria, Germany as Roswicha Bertasha Smid Honczar. She is an actress, known for Conan the Barbarian (1982), The People Who Own the Dark (1976) and La muerte ronda a Mónica (1976). She was previously married to Fernando Montalbán Sánchez.
biography.name: Nadiuska

biography.birthName: Alberto Manuel Rodríguez Gallego Gonzáles de Mendoza
biography.bio: Alberto de Mendoza was born on January 21, 1923 in Buenos Aires, Argentina as Alberto Manuel Rodríguez Gallego Gonzáles de Mendoza. He was an actor, known for Horror Express (1972), Tapas (2005) and The Boss (1958). He died on December 12, 2011 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Alberto de Mendoza

biography.bio: She begins as a model for TV and cinema spots. She debuts in cinema in 1965, working not only in Spain, but in France and Italy as well.
biography.name: Teresa Gimpera

biography.bio: Emiliano Redondo was born on August 15, 1937 in Peñarroya-Pueblonuevo, Córdoba, Andalucía, Spain as Emiliano Redondo Ares. He was an actor, known for Tie Me Up! Tie Me Down! (1989), Peppermint Frappé (1967) and Autopsia (1973). He died on November 15, 2014 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Emiliano Redondo

biography.bio: Julia Saly was born as Julia Salinero. She is an actress and producer, known for Night of the Werewolf (1981), Panic Beats (1983) and Night of the Seagulls (1975).
biography.name: Julia Saly

biography.bio: Tomás Picó was born on January 16, 1940 in Cáceres, Cáceres, Extremadura, Spain as Tomás Picó Hormeño. He was an actor, known for La queue du scorpion (1971), The Lady of the Orient-Express (1989) and The People Who Own the Dark (1976). He died on March 29, 2013 in Tarifa, Cádiz, Andalucía, Spain.
biography.name: Tomás Picó

biography.bio: Diana Polakov is an actress, known for Supersonic Man (1979), The Carrot Queen (1977) and The People Who Own the Dark (1976).
biography.name: Diana Polakov

biography.bio: Antonio Mayans was born on May 4, 1939 in Valencia, Spain as José Antonio Mayans Hervás. He is an actor and production manager, known for Al Pereira vs. the Alligator Ladies (2012), Oasis of the Zombies (1982) and La chute de la maison Usher (1983). He is married to Juana de la Morena. They have three children.
biography.name: Antonio Mayans

biography.bio: Leona Devine is an actress, known for The People Who Own the Dark (1976).
biography.name: Leona Devine

biography.bio: Ricardo Palacios was born on March 2, 1940 in Reinosa, Cantabria, Spain as Ricardo López-Nuño Díez. He was an actor and writer, known for ¡Biba la banda! (1987), Going Down in Morocco (1989) and Return of the Magnificent Seven (1966). He died on February 11, 2015 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Ricardo Palacios

biography.bio: Carmen Platero is an actress, known for Manuela (1976), Señoritas de uniforme (1976) and El consenso (1980).
biography.name: Carmen Platero

biography.bio: Estela Delgado is an actress, known for ¡Bruja, más que bruja! (1977), The People Who Own the Dark (1976) and Family Portrait (1976).
biography.name: Estela Delgado

biography.bio: Barta Barri was born on August 16, 1911 in Budapest, Austria-Hungary as Bernabé Barta Barry. He was an actor, known for Red Sun (1971), Horror Express (1972) and The Werewolf Versus the Vampire Woman (1971). He was married to Maria Cañete. He died on December 7, 2003 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Barta Barri

biography.bio: Gumersindo Andrés was born on March 26, 1938 in Cartagena, Murcia, Spain as Gumersindo Andrés López. He is a costume designer and set decorator, known for Pieces (1982), The Grandfather (1998) and You're the One (2000).
biography.name: Gumersindo Andrés

biography.bio: Gonzalo Tejada is an actor, known for The People Who Own the Dark (1976) and No quiero perder la honra (1975).
biography.name: Gonzalo Tejada

keywords: reference to the marquis de sade
